sourcesContent:
import "./promo.css"; import promoImg from "./../../img/images/header-img.jpg"; const Promo = () => { return (
LET’S EXPLORE UNIQUE CLOTHES.
Live for Influential and Innovative fashion!
Shop Now
); }; export default Promo;
